alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 2:11PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Bayfield, west central Iron and southern Ashland Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 210 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clam Lake, or 26 miles northeast of Chippewa Flowage East, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mellen around 230 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Gurney and Upson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for northwestern Wisconsin.
